    "clinicId": "CLINIC-001",//Dynamiac genration 
    "token": 1,//Dynamiac genration 
    "queue": "Dr. Mita Sen",
    "room": "100",//Dynamiac genration 
    "currency": "INR",
    "notes": "OPD Consultation Bill",
    "items": [
        {
            "serviceItemId": 2,
            "name": "Consultation (Video – International Patients – Rs.700.0)",
            "qty": 1,
            "unitPrice": 499.00,

item.name: 7. List All Payments for an Invoice
5) With all optional params (doctorId, roomNo, availability, q)
2) PREVIEW SLOTS (No DB write; verify generated grid)
3) VALIDATE (No DB write; verifies overlap rules)
4) DRAFT (Creates/updates schedule in DB; returns scheduleId + version)
4) DRAFT GLOBAL_TEMPLATE(Creates/updates schedule in DB; returns scheduleId + version)
8) PUBLISH (Writes into your existing slots table)
